short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all ads on Twitter with an ad from ":3" that's just filled with meowing and :3

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turns out people really want this extension, so here it is.

Currently only replaces ads on Twitter, but I'm planning on expanding it to other websites too.
! YOU HAVE TO SET YOUR TWITTER LANGUAGE TO ENGLISH !

Features:
- replaces ads with something better
- doesn't let you accidentally like ads
- meow :3
- doesn't replace Chiitan's ad because people don't want it to
